div.p: This code system http://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/ms-drg/MS defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: MS-DRGs (Medicare Severity Diagnosis Related Groups). MS-DRGs are owned by CMS. Assignment of a DRG is defined by a particular set of patient attributes, which include principal diagnosis, specific secondary diagnoses, procedures, sex and discharge status. Identifying a DRG code requires a version.

copyright.value: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) maintain the MS-DRGs used throughout the US health care industry.
